x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Citizens often witness or experience incidents - harassment, fraud, abuse, civic violations but lack a secure, structured way to preserve evidence and report it legally. Screenshots, videos, and voice notes get lost or deleted, and many fear retaliation or don’t know how to escalate safely. NGOs and legal clinics want to help, but lack scalable tools for evidence intake and follow-up. This leads to underreporting, lost justice opportunities, and emotional distress.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

- App Engine Studio for case records, evidence logs, and contributor profiles
- Flow Designer for routing reports, assigning legal aid, and sending updates - UI Builder for dashboards and mobile-friendly views - IntegrationHub for syncing with civic APIs, SMS/email platforms, or legal databases - Attachment API for uploading evidence files, documents, and case notes - QR Code Generation & Base64 Encoding for case access and reporting tools - Scoped App with ACLs for privacy, role-based access, and moderation
